description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国最高人民法院副院长。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as the Vice President of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国江西省的一个县级市，是曾汉周的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city in Jiangxi Province, China, and the birthplace of Zeng Hanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 亚洲的一个社会主义国家，成立于1949年。
description.en: A socialist state in Asia, founded in 1949.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院
en: Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高审判机关。
description.en: The highest judicial organ of the People's Republic of China.

en: Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在第二次国内革命战争时期领导的军队。
description.en: The armed forces led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军的一次大规模军事转移行动。
description.en: A large-scale military retreat undertaken by the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共内战期间，中国共产党在东北地区创办的军事政治学校。
description.en: A military and political school established by the Communist Party of China in Northeast China during the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的基本法律之一，规定了犯罪、刑事责任和刑罚的种类与适用。
description.en: One of the fundamental laws of the People's Republic of China, which defines crimes, criminal responsibility, and the types and application of criminal penalties.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的基本法律之一，规定了刑事案件的侦查、起诉、审判和执行等程序。
description.en: One of the fundamental laws of the People's Republic of China, which stipulates the procedures for criminal investigation, prosecution, trial, and execution.

nodes.id: 最高人民法院特别法庭

zh-cn: 最高人民法院特别法庭
en: Special Court of the Supreme People's Court

description.zh-cn: 为审判林彪、江青反革命集团案而设立的特别法庭。
description.en: A special court established to try the cases of the Lin Biao and Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary cliques.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾被列为毛泽东的接班人，后被定性为“林彪反革命集团”首脑。
description.en: A Marshal of the People's Republic of China, once designated as Mao Zedong's successor, later identified as the head of the 'Lin Biao counter-revolutionary clique'.

description.zh-cn: 指文化大革命后期的四个核心人物：王洪文、张春桥、江青、姚文元。后被定性为“江青反革命集团”。
description.en: Refers to the four core figures in the later stages of the Cultural Revolution: Wang Hongwen, Zhang Chunqiao, Jiang Qing, and Yao Wenyuan. Later labeled as the 'Jiang Qing counter-revolutionary clique'.

description.zh-cn: 曾汉周是江西瑞金人。
description.en: Zeng Hanzhou was from Ruijin, Jiangxi.

description.zh-cn: 曾汉周早年参加中国工农红军，历任红军总部特务团二连、延安警卫营二连司务长，抗大四大队供给处主任等职。
description.en: Zeng Hanzhou joined the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army in his early years and successively served as quartermaster of the 2nd company of the special agent regiment of the Red Army headquarters, quartermaster of the 2nd company of the Yan'an guard battalion, and director of the supply department of the 4th brigade of the Counter-Japanese Military and Political University.

description.zh-cn: 曾汉周参加了长征。
description.en: Zeng Hanzhou participated in the Long March.

position.en: Head of the Supply Department, Political Commissar

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间，曾汉周担任东北军政大学供给部部长、政治委员。
description.en: During the Chinese Civil War, Zeng Hanzhou served as the Head of the Supply Department and Political Commissar of the Northeast Military and Political University.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国最高人民法院

description.zh-cn: 曾汉周曾担任中华人民共和国最高人民法院副院长，并历任副秘书长、交通庭庭长、刑庭庭长等职。
description.en: Zeng Hanzhou served as the Vice President of the Supreme People's Court of the People's Republic of China, and had also held positions such as Deputy Secretary-General, Chief of the Transportation Tribunal, and Chief of the Criminal Tribunal.

description.zh-cn: 曾汉周参与了《中华人民共和国刑法》的制定工作。
description.en: Zeng Hanzhou participated in the formulation of the Criminal Law of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 曾汉周参与了《中华人民共和国刑事诉讼法》的制定工作。
description.en: Zeng Hanzhou participated in the formulation of the Criminal Procedure Law of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 最高人民法院特别法庭

position.zh-cn: 副庭长兼第一审判庭审判长
position.en: Vice Chief and Presiding Judge of the First Tribunal

description.zh-cn: 1980年9月，曾汉周担任最高人民法院特别法庭副庭长兼第一审判庭审判长，负责审判林彪和四人帮集团。
description.en: In September 1980, Zeng Hanzhou served as the Vice Chief of the Special Court of the Supreme People's Court and the Presiding Judge of the First Tribunal, responsible for the trial of the Lin Biao and Gang of Four cliques.

description.zh-cn: 作为最高人民法院特别法庭的审判长，曾汉周负责并主持了对林彪反革命集团的审判工作。
description.en: As the presiding judge of the Special Court of the Supreme People's Court, Zeng Hanzhou was responsible for and presided over the trial of the Lin Biao counter-revolutionary clique.

description.zh-cn: 作为最高人民法院特别法庭的审判长，曾汉周负责并主持了对四人帮反革命集团的审判工作。
description.en: As the presiding judge of the Special Court of the Supreme People's Court, Zeng Hanzhou was responsible for and presided over the trial of the Gang of Four counter-revolutionary clique.
